question: What is the theme of the 2018 World Blood Donor Day (WBDD)?
option1: Thank you for saving my life
option2: Give the gift of life : donate blood
option3: Every blood donor is a hero
option4: Be there for someone else. Give blood. Share life
answer: Be there for someone else. Give blood. Share life
explanation: The World Blood Donor Day (WBDD) is observed every year on June 14 across the globe to thank voluntary, unpaid blood donors for their life-saving gifts of blood. The day also strongly encourages more people to donate blood so that the donor population does not decline and patients requiring transfusion have timely access to safe blood. The 2018 theme is \'Be there for someone else. Give blood. Share life\'.
